topic.title: Did the Holohoax really happen ?
topic.body: A tiny minority of WW II casulaties were dirty jews.

1_1Ax5yj36bQDizcaeCMn9upKzVVyQ4wsm48.body: Sanders is a dirty jew. The Donald will send him off to Auschwitz, where the motherfucker belongs. Send all jew scum to Poland!

> [nnnnnnnnn](#comment_1_1CDkheadGbhxVvNCHn2nvH7GBDnwm5V8oi): The jews will setup the core zero-server at Auschwitz and gas all users.


We must excise the jewish cancer before it is too late.

1_1LP5G2PJAXqmcvKeVF8Z3v73G6ezmwFUQ2.body:
The number of neutralized jews in WW II. range from 70.000 to 6.000.000

This clearly shows that no one has a fucking clue how many of that scum actually zilched out.
It is more than obvious that too few jews actually kicked the bucket in WW II. The jews were cowards and hid in holes in the ground like some rats.
